# Deafening Clang (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Sonic Spells|sonic]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Your weapon

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial; see text

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 59

*At your touch, the weapon rings like a struck tuning fork. The sound diminishes until itâ€™s imperceptible, but when you touch the weapon you can feel the vibration.*

You empower the touched weapon with magic that causes it to emit a loud clang when it is struck against a hard surface, such as a floor, wall, or creature. The weapon deals 1d6 points of sonic damage with each successful hit, and any creature struck by the weapon must succeed on a Fortitude saving throw or be [[Deafened|deafened]] for 1 minute.
